statement.tex: %text If matrix $A=(1,2,3)$, write $AA'$, where $A'$ is the transpose of matrix A. %

step.context: %text What is the transpose $A'$ of row matrix $A=\left[1,2,3\right]$? %
step.reason: %text Transpose of a matrix means interchanging the rows and columns with each other. I,e. row $n$ becomes column $n$ and so on. Transpose of a $n\times m$ matrix is a $m\times n$ matrix. %
